scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase serve --only functions
scripts.shell: npm run build && firebase use staging && firebase functions:shell
scripts.deploy:staging: firebase use staging && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:staging:api: firebase use staging && firebase deploy --only functions:api
scripts.deploy:staging:trigger: firebase use staging && firebase deploy --only functions:trigger
scripts.deploy:staging:pubsub: firebase use staging && firebase deploy --only functions:pubsub
scripts.deploy:production: firebase use production && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:production:api: firebase use production && firebase deploy --only functions:api
scripts.deploy:production:trigger: firebase use production && firebase deploy --only functions:trigger
scripts.deploy:production:pubsub: firebase use production && firebase deploy --only functions:pubsub
